summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 CHEVROLET TRAILBLAZER. AFTER STARTING THE VEHICLE THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE SPEEDOMETER HAD SUDDENLY RISEN TO 50 MPH WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS STILL IN PARK. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALERSHIP WHERE THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE INSTRUMENT PANEL NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THERE WERE NO PRIOR WARNINGS. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 63000 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 69000.
